comments.author: szegedia@freemail.hu
comments.body: Committed to master on GitHub - thanks

description:
Created attachment 557737
Patch to fix bug described

Calls to AstNode.operatorToString fail for operator 92 (i.e. '^=').

Also included in the patch is a fix for the build as a downloaded binary is only available as a newer version.
summary: AstNode missing operator name "^=" (ASSIGN_BITXOR) - patch included
